instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: Macbook Pro A1502 (820-4924-08)Stuck in Apple Logo
threads.message:
Hello Jhon here Again, I have macbook pro A1502 it has Complete Power Rails but cannot proceed to turn on.If i will remove the SSD the screen show (?) question mark. I also try to boot my bootable drive but the same cannot proceed to boot up. I did SMC reset and the same issue. I notice sometimes its shuting down  automatically during booting time when apple logo show up.

What is the possible issue of this macbook please help me. Please see the pic attached,

Thanks

threads.title: Macbook Pro A1502 (820-4924-08)Stuck in Apple Logo
threads.message:
You cannot enter macOS botting through USB?
In such case, you should discard a BIOS issue.
Clean your ME region, or try full known good BIOS file; with clean ME, of course.

threads.title: Macbook Pro A1502 (820-4924-08)Stuck in Apple Logo
threads.message: I was able to enter the boot menu but after few seconds its shuting down only once. But now I cannot enter to boot menu. Maybe you have good bios file sir I never have any here.

threads.title: Macbook Pro A1502 (820-4924-08)Stuck in Apple Logo
threads.message:
820-4924 BIOS link should be already posted on the forum.
